pages.text: I observed the leprechauns exchanging gold for items they desired by placing down their hats on a chest near the pot of gold. A tree root they had enchanted on the ritual altar before, appeared to instruct which item to pull out of the pot. What follows is a list of steps I wrote down to achieve this.

Place a chest near the pot. Craft a leprechaun hat, and place it on the chest. Right click the pot with the clover staff, then right click the hat to link the two. The enchanted tree roots are then used to select the item to be extracted from the pot. Simply take one and right-click the linked hat with it. You should now see the item visualized above the hat.

Items have a gold coin cost, and the pot will only produce items if it is fed gold. This is accomplished by crafting, and then placing, a gold arconium block under another linked hat. The gold arconium block determines the tier of the pot. Only enchanted tree roots of the same, or lower, tier will pull items from the pot.
The first item to collect is arconium essence, which is a powerful ingredient for various other items that unlock more treasures that can be obtained from the pot of gold.
Crouching with both hands empty while right-clicking a linked hat will return the enchanted tree root.
